text: 2061 (MMLXI) will be . ==Predicted and scheduled events== * January 1 â€“ Books, movies, and other works published in 1965 will enter the public domain in the United States. * 100th anniversary of the Sprite. * 100th anniversary of JFK * Halley's Comet will get as close as it can to the Sun.
